field.name: az_plid
field.label: Azuracast ID
field.description: This is the internal Azuracast ID

field.name: scheduledcnt
field.label: No of schedule times
field.description: number of scheduled times for this playlist

field.name: publicschd
field.label: Show Public
field.description: Choose whether to hide this playlists's schedules times from the public schedule. Useful for short promo playlists and generic all day playlists that may be interrupted by scheduled programme segments.

field.name: azstation
field.label: Azuracast Station xbID
field.description: The xbMusic database id for the station (NOT the internal azuracast station id which may no be unique across servers)

field.name: azplaylist
field.label: Azuracast Playlist
field.description: Azuracast Playlist linked to this one

field.name: az_name
field.label: Azuracast Name
field.description: This name is used by Azuracast to display in the schedule. It should be limited to 20 chars to be sure to fit the Azuracast schedule display. The Playlist Title will default to the Azuracast name if not set, but can be longer and is used in the xbMusic schedule display

field.name: az_type
field.label: Playlist Type
field.description: 'General Rotation' : Standard playlist, shuffles with other standard playlists based on weight, 'N Songs' : plays once every number of songs, 'N Minutes' : plays once every number of minutes, 'Hourly' : plays at the specified minute past the hour, 'Custom' : is for use with a custom Liquidsoap configuration - must be edited in Azuracast
field.option: Hourly at Nth minute of hour

field.name: az_cntper
field.label: Value for 'N'
field.description: the number of songs (N Songs) or minutes (N Minutes) to repeat the playlist, or the minutes past every hour (Hourly)

field.name: az_order
field.label: List Ordering
field.description: 'Shuffled' : The full playlist is shuffled and then played through in the shuffled order. 'Random' : A completely random track is picked for playback every time the queue is populated. 'Sequential' : The order of the playlist is manually specified and followed by the AutoDJ.

field.name: az_weight
field.label: List Weight
field.description: Lower weight playlists have lower priority

field.name: az_jingle
field.label: Jingle Mode
field.description: Enable this setting to prevent metadata from being sent to the AutoDJ for files in this playlist. This is useful if the playlist contains jingles or bumpers.

field.name: az_info
field.label: raw data
field.description: This is the raw data stored on azuracast.

field.name: schedulelist
field.label: Schedule Items
field.description: Scheduled play time for this playlist

field.name: description
field.label: Edit Description
field.description: Plain text or Markdown code.

field.name: allowdupes
field.label: Allow Duplicates
field.description: Allow duplicate tracks in the list. Only appropriate if List Ordering is Sequential

field.name: loadsource
field.label: Source for Tracklist
field.description: Load from file already in xbmusic-data/m3u, or upload from browser, or load from Azuracast

field.name: savedest
field.label: Destination for Tracklist
field.description: Load from file already in xbmusic-data/m3u, or upload from browser, or load from Azuracast

field.name: upload_filem3u
field.label: Upload file
field.description: Import tracklist from .m3u file. Append to existing tracks - use clear first if neessary

field.name: local_filem3u
field.label: Select file
field.description: Import tracklist from .m3u file. Append to existing tracks - use clear first if neessary

field.name: ignoremissing
field.label: Ignore Missing Files
field.description: If file is list does not exist in /xbmusic then either ignore it or abort the import

field.name: createtrks
field.label: Create Missing Tracks
field.description: If file exists in /xbmusic but no corresponding track in database then create or ignore

field.name: clearfirst
field.label: Clear or Append
field.description: Clear any existing tracklist before loading, or append new tracklist to existing.

field.name: clearremote
field.label: Clear Azuracast first or Append
field.description: Clear existing tracklist on Azuracast before uploading, or append tracklist to existing.
